title: (x) Converse - Modern - custom, various alternatives {Tiffany, Florian, Lazarin}
content:
Trying to figure out what font Converse uses for their logo?

[http://www.freewebs.com/conversegirls100/converse%20girls.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/www.freewebs.com/conversegirls100/converse%20girls.JPG "http://www.freewebs.com/conversegirls100/converse%20girls.JPG")
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: That is custom. Would something similar be acceptable?
Definitely! What's the closest thing you can think of?

Some ideas:  
 [FF Golden Gate/Moderne Gothics](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=golden+gate&x=0&y=0&sample_text=CONVERSE%20converse&sample_size=48)  
 [Morgan Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/morgan-poster/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D31)  
 [Hotel](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/hotel/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D23), [Fresno](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/fresno/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D24), [Amboy](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/amboy/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D23)  
 [MVB Solano Gothic Retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=mvb+solano+gothic&sample_text=CONVERSE%20converse&sample_size=48)  
 [Futura Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/urw/futura_display/?&sample_text=CONVERSE%20converse&sample_size=48)  
 [WPA Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/wpa_gothic)  
 [Pacifico](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/pacifico/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D25)  
 [Venacti](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/venacti/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D28%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D26)  
 [Kanal](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kanal/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCONVERSE%2520converse%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D17)

Hi. There's actually a free font called Converse Font. You can download it from here: [http://www.typenow.net/themed.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824163455/http:/www.typenow.net/themed.htm "http://www.typenow.net/themed.htm") (scroll down to no. 252). Hope that was useful.
